card.name: TBLD Command Seal
card.text: 2, Exile this: Choose a card in exile, card in your graveyard, card in your command zone, or creature you control. If it’s your captain, return it to your hand. This ability can’t be countered.

card.name: TBLD The Monarch
card.text: At your end step, draw a card. Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, its controller becomes the monarch.

card.name: TBLD Shift Token
card.reverse-related: TBLD Stag of the Deep Wilds

card.name: TBLD Zombie5
card.reverse-related: TBLD Endless Ranks of the Dead

card.name: TBLD Pesky Cave-Bat Token
card.text: Flying, lifelink Experience (Whenever this attacks, if it has less than three +1/+1 counters, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: TBLD Chapel Shieldgeist
card.text: Flying, first strike Each creature you control has ward 1. (Whenever this becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 1.) If this would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: TBLD Deathbonnet Hulk
card.text: At your upkeep, you may exile a card from a graveyard. If a creature card was exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this.

card.name: TBLD Corpseyard Howler
card.text: G, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Creatures you control get +1/+1 this turn. At each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform this.

card.name: TBLD Hissing Caretaker
card.text: Deathtouch When this transforms into Hissing Caretaker, untap it. 3G: Regenerate this. (The next time this would be destroyed this turn, remove all damage from it instead.)

card.name: TBLD Blooming Titan
card.text: Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player’s untap step.

card.name: TBLD Brazen Poltergeist
card.text: Menace Whenever this attacks and isn’t blocked. Whenever an opponent discards a card, they lose 2 life.

card.name: TBLD Lord of Lineage
card.text: Flying Other Vampires you control get +2/+2. T: Create a 2/2 black Vampire token with flying.

card.name: TBLD Turbulent Grappler
card.text: This can’t be blocked by more than one creature. Whenever this transforms into Turbulent Grappler, attacks, or blocks, you may switch this creature’s power and toughness this turn.

card.name: TBLD Fiery Brute
card.text: Menace 3R: This gets +3/+0 this turn. Whenever this untaps, it deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: TBLD Earthshaker Hulk
card.text: Trample When this transforms into Earthshaker Hulk, creatures without flying can’t block this turn.

card.name: TBLD Tentacled Kraken
card.text: When this transforms into Tentacled Kraken, return all other nonland, non-Leviathan permanents to their owner’s hand.

card.name: TBLD Jovial Gadabout
card.text: T: Add GG. At your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: TBLD Bristling Dunerunner
card.text: First strike Whenever an opponent attacks with two or more creatures, untap this.

card.name: TBLD Flameheart Werewolf
card.text: Whenever this blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, this deals 2 damage to that creature. At each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform this.

card.name: TBLD Merciless Killer
card.text: At each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform this.

card.name: TBLD Unthinkable Experiment
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for two creature cards with mana value equal to one less than the the sacrificed creature’s mana value and put them into play.

card.name: TBLD Backyard Resurrection
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.

card.name: TBLD Damnable Pact
card.text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

card.name: TBLD Quicken
card.text: The next spell you cast this turn may be cast at flash speed. Draw a card.

card.name: TBLD Flummox
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1.

card.name: TBLD Contradict
card.text: Counter target spell. Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: TBLD Funerary Pyre
card.text: Exile all cards from target player’s graveyard. Gain 1 life for each creature card exiled this way. Draw a card.

card.name: TBLD Hardy Renewal
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: TBLD Path to Redemption
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller searches their library for a basic-typed land card and puts it into play tapped.

card.name: TBLD Unbounded Inquiry
card.text: Scry 5, then upload the top card of your library. (Exile it. Pay 2 during your turn to put an uploaded card into your hand.)

card.name: TBLD Commune with Nature
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: TBLD Gather for the Feast
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic-typed land cards and put them into play tapped. Create a Food token. (It’s an artifact with “2, T, Sacrifice this: Gain 3 life.”)

card.name: TBLD Stream of Lightning
card.text: This deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

card.name: TBLD Dictum of the Scalelords
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

card.name: TBLD Impulsive Action
card.text: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile two nonland cards. You may cast one of them. (You still need to pay its costs.)

card.name: TBLD Gleeful Predator
card.text: Sacrifice a Clue: This fights target creature. At each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform this.

card.name: TBLD Luminous Phantom
card.text: Flying Whenever another creature you control leaves play, gain 1 life. If this would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: TBLD Nacatl Prowler
card.text: Hexproof Whenever this attacks, untap up to one target creature defending player controls. It blocks this creature this turn if able.

card.name: TBLD Fated Sovereign
card.text: Vigilance Renown 2 (When this deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, if it isn’t renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.) When this becomes renowned, you become the monarch.

card.name: TBLD Shield-Sigil Patron
card.text: Flying, ward 2 Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 this turn.) When this enters play, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return it to play under your control. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: TBLD Shrewd Sphinx
card.text: This spell can’t be countered. Flying At your end step, draw a card, then discard a card. Discard a card with mana value X: Counter target spell with mana value X.

card.name: TBLD Harvester of Souls
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever another nontoken creature dies, draw a card.

card.name: TBLD Vicious Overlord
card.text: Flying R: This gets +1/+0 this turn. When this enters play, each player sacrifices two lands.

card.name: TBLD Screaming Amalgam
card.text: When this enters play, create a 2/2 black Zombie token with decayed. Whenever this attacks, each player discards card. B, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate this.

card.name: TBLD Wurm2
card.text: This can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: TBLD Wurm
card.text: At your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on this.

card.text: When this enters play, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
